content: ***note that the diamonds in this doily are filled in * * the pansy doily 1 with open mesh diamonds is in star book 145 *** **materials ** * 1 - 100 yard ball white * 1 - 80 yard ball shaded lavenders * 1 - 80 yard ball shaded yellows * 3 yards green * steel crochet hook no 11 size 30 thread = 7 25 diameter size 10 thread = 12 diameter pattern is called **pretty pansies** in *house of white birches old-time doilies* pattern is called **viola pansy doily** in *house of white birches #101057 old-time crochet made easy* pattern is called gesiggies in sarie marais centre is slightly less lacy shown with yellow and purple pansies alternating 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pansy-doily
